channel_template: This channel has had no activity for {}+ days and is being auto-archived to reduce channel clutter. If you feel this is a mistake you can <https://slack.com/help/articles/201563847-Archive-a-channel#unarchive-a-channel|unarchive this channel> to bring it back at any point. In the future, you can add 'noarchive' to your channel topic or purpose to avoid being archived.
